bibl.title: Romanitas. Essays on Roman Archaeology in Honour of Sheppard Frere on the Occasion of his Ninetieth Birthday.

bibl.seg: Michael Mackensen, Late Roman African Red Slip Ware from the Frontier Region in the Province of Thebaïs (Upper Egypt).
